categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ibellia Ran's father was a male Human officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Great Galactic War. He had a daughter named Ibellia Ran from an Imperial slave, who became a free citizen of the Empire.
Ibellia Ran's father is mentioned briefly in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial Agent class mission on the Dominator.
